summary: PosterPage was updated to render an pointing to /assets/carry-2.png with responsive styling and a non-empty English alt attribute, but the diff does not show the required static asset file (carry-2.png) being added to the frontend.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the user-uploaded image file `carry-2.png` to the frontend static assets and render it on the `/posters` route (PosterPage).
missing_requirements.reason: PosterPage references `/assets/carry-2.png`, but no new static asset file is shown as added in the diff (ADDED FILES: none). Without the actual PNG in the static assets, the image may 404 on refresh and would not satisfy the static-asset requirement.
evidence: File diff summary: ADDED FILES: none
